title: Talking masculinity with the 'most dangerous therapist in the world', Jerry Hyde
description:
Jerry Hyde is a shadow therapist with 25 years clinical experience, who rejects many of the conventionally held views of the mainstream psychotherapy world. 

He works primarily with men, and has run men's groups for decades, which have years-long waiting lists to join. 

He has just released a documentary based on the experience of leading men’s groups, called Make Me a Man, directed with partner Mia Hua: https://www.jerryhyde.co.uk/film

We are releasing this as Rebel Wisdom restarts our weekend men's retreats after a two year break for Covid, check out the details here: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/retreats
